channel.title: Ok I need help with my client (pi)
channel.description:
ok First I have a client that came with a cache in it.
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/k01on4.png[/img]
Ok now, I want to move the cache to my local c disk, but when i do move it, when i press run it says it can't find it right.
ok now, how do i move the cache to my local c disk so my client can read it at my local c disk? Because I want to make a web client but I need to move my cache to local c disk so i can make a .jar file.

item.title: Ok I need help with my client (pi)
item.dc:creator: @deatharmy deatharmy
item.description:
@deatharmy wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:4, topic:465125”][quote author=deatharmy link=topic=569759.msg4131269#msg4131269 date=1351110181]

Move to wherever you want it to be. Just modify your signlink.java

Alright thanks, btw you know what part of code i have to modify?
[/quote]

The findcachedir method.[/quote]

Hmm yea i saw that. I was just doing the code wrong. thank you so much.

Read full topic
item.source: Ok I need help with my client (pi)

Move to wherever you want it to be. Just modify your signlink.java
[/quote]
Alright thanks, btw you know what part of code i have to modify?[/quote]

The findcachedir method.
